slotCount.title: Max Players
slotCount.description: Set as low as possible for best performance

playerHealthFactor.title: Player Health
playerHealthFactor.description: Scales the max health for players by a factor. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

playerManaFactor.title: Player Mana
playerManaFactor.description: Scales the max mana for players by a factor. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

playerStaminaFactor.title: Player Stamina
playerStaminaFactor.description: Scales the max stamina for players by a factor. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

playerBodyHeatFactor.title: Player Body Heat
playerBodyHeatFactor.description: Scales the max amount of available body heat in the player. The higher the factor the longer the player can stay in very cold areas before hypothermia sets in.

enableDurability.title: Weapon Durability
enableDurability.description: If this setting is set to “false”, weapons don't break anymore.

enableStarvingDebuff.title: Hunger and Starvation
enableStarvingDebuff.description: Enables hunger and starvation. During starvation, the player loses health periodically until death if no food or drink is consumed.

foodBuffDurationFactor.title: Food Buff Duration
foodBuffDurationFactor.description: Scales food buff durations. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

fromHungerToStarving.title: Hungry State Duration
fromHungerToStarving.description: This setting controls the length of the hungry state before the starving sets in. The unit in this setting is nanoseconds. Ingame the time is displayed in minutes.

shroudTimeFactor.title: Shroud time duration modifier
shroudTimeFactor.description: Scales how long player characters can remain within the Shroud. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

tombstoneMode.title: Tombstone Mode
tombstoneMode.description: The players can either keep or lose all items from their backpack when dying. In the default setting, they only lose materials. Lost items are stored in a tombstone and can be recovered there.

enableGliderTurbulences.title: Air turbulence while gliding
enableGliderTurbulences.description: If turned off, the glider will not be affected by air turbulences, just as in previous versions of the game.

weatherFrequency.title: Weather phenomena frequency
weatherFrequency.description: This setting allows defining how often new weather phenomena appear in the game world.

miningDamageFactor.title: Mining Effectiveness
miningDamageFactor.description: This scales the mining damage. A higher mining damage leads to increased terraforming and more yield of resources per hit. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

plantGrowthSpeedFactor.title: Plant Growth Speed
plantGrowthSpeedFactor.description: Scales the value of the plant growth speed. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

resourceDropStackAmountFactor.title: Resources Gain Modifier
resourceDropStackAmountFactor.description: Scales the amount of materials per loot stack in chests, defeated enemies etc. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

factoryProductionSpeedFactor.title: Workstation Effectiveness
factoryProductionSpeedFactor.description: Scales the length of production times for workshop items. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

perkUpgradeRecyclingFactor.title: Weapon Recycling Yield Modifier
perkUpgradeRecyclingFactor.description: Scales the amount of Runes that are returned to you when salvaging upgraded weapons. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

perkCostFactor.title: Weapon Upgrading Costs
perkCostFactor.description: Scales the amount of Runes required for upgrading weapons. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

experienceCombatFactor.title: Combat Experience Modifier
experienceCombatFactor.description: Scales the amount of XP received through combat. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

experienceMiningFactor.title: Mining Experience Modifier
experienceMiningFactor.description: Scales the amount of XP received by mining resources. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

experienceExplorationQuestsFactor.title: Exploration Experience Modifier
experienceExplorationQuestsFactor.description: Scales the amount of XP received by exploring and completing quests. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

randomSpawnerAmount.title: Enemy Amount
randomSpawnerAmount.description: This setting controls the amount of enemies in the world.

aggroPoolAmount.title: Modifier for simultaneous Enemy Attacks
aggroPoolAmount.description: This setting controls how many enemies are allowed to attack at the same time. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

enemyDamageFactor.title: Enemy Damage
enemyDamageFactor.description: Scales all enemy damage by this value - except for bosses. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

enemyHealthFactor.title: Enemy Health
enemyHealthFactor.description: Scales all enemy health by this value - except for bosses. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

enemyStaminaFactor.title: Enemy Stamina
enemyStaminaFactor.description: Scales all enemy stamina by this value. It will take longer to stun enemies with a higher enemy stamina. This excludes bosses. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

enemyPerceptionRangeFactor.title: Enemy Perception Modifier
enemyPerceptionRangeFactor.description: Scales how far enemies can see and hear the player. This excludes bosses. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

bossDamageFactor.title: Boss Damage Modifier
bossDamageFactor.description: This setting scales the damage of boss attacks. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

bossHealthFactor.title: Boss Health Modifier
bossHealthFactor.description: Scales health of all bosses by this value. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

threatBonus.title: Enemy Attacks Modifier
threatBonus.description: Scales the frequency of enemy attacks. This excludes bosses. Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

pacifyAllEnemies.title: Pacified Enemies
pacifyAllEnemies.description: If turned on, enemies won't attack the players until they are attacked. This excludes bosses.

tamingStartleRepercussion.title: Taming failure repercussions
tamingStartleRepercussion.description: This setting allows defining how the game reacts when the player startles the wildlife during taming. Progress is visualized by hearts in the game.

dayTimeDuration.title: Daytime
dayTimeDuration.description: Scales the length of daytime. A smaller value equals shorter daytime. The unit is nanoseconds. Ingame, the time is displayed in minutes.

nightTimeDuration.title: Nighttime
nightTimeDuration.description: Scales the length of daytime. A smaller value equals a shorter nighttime. The unit is nanoseconds. Ingame, the time is displayed in minutes.
